name: last-grab
0:
”Alexa open last grab”
”One block of Red”
”Three blocks of Yellow”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: last grab
des: You need an Alexa enabled screen such as Echo Show to play the Last Grab Game. There are 20 color blocks in the grid. Each turn, you need to grab at least one block or grab as many blocks of the same color as you like. The player who grabs the very last block to fully reveal the picture in the grid wins the game. To start the game, say something like one block of blue to grab a blue block, or two blocks of purple to grab two purple blocks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
